content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 12.6 - Hearings and investigations

State Regulations
(a) Notice of the scheduling of a public hearing or the commencement of an investigation pursuant to section 1612
shall be made by mailing such notice to the person and address specified in section
12.5
(d)(11)
of this

Part. Notes

Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
12.6

Amended

New York State Register July 3, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
